name: API Data Source
description: Plugin used to generate stream based on an external datasources API.
full_description: Plugin used to generate stream based on an external datasources API. This plugin can call any API specified and save the data according to any model you want to use. You can specify the interval at which this plugin can be called.

variables.name: Ceramic Seed
variables.description: The Ceramic seed that will be used to create the streams.

variables.name: URL Endpoint
variables.description: Endpoint to call to retrieve the results.

variables.name: Keys mapping
variables.description: Map your data source output to your Ceramic schema.

variables.name: Model ID
variables.description: ID of the model you want to use to store the data retrieved.

variables.name: Interval
variables.description: Interval in seconds to perform the API call.
